content: 5 p2 wt row 6 k3 wt row 7 p4 wt row 8 k5 eor sts are now picked up along the edges of your work then joined in the round with the first 6 sts turn your work so that the rs is facing and the working yarn is coming from the first st at the top of your needle with 2 additional dpns pu 6 sts total around the edges of your work 1 on each edge and 4 along the co side for a total of 6 new sts 12 sts total eor join in the round rnds 1-6 k all sts round 7 k2tog k8 ssk 10 sts round 8 k all sts round 9 k2tog k6 ssk 8 sts cut yarn thread through remaining live sts and pull closed weave in loose end flatten wings front to back and seam to sides of body with decreases on the bottom and straight edge along the top beak with scrap of peach colored yarn and 3 smaller size dpns pu 7 sts in a circular cluster about 4-5 row down from top/center of head join sts in the round round 1 k all sts round 2 k2tog 3x k1 4 sts cut yarn thread through remaining live sts and pull closed weave in loose end 5
